title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Ranger Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger Programs              Ranger Programs         Ranger table talk on bears NPS Photo/D.Dixon  North Cascades offers interpretive programs, ranger-led walks and talks, in various locations throughout the summer. See the details for each area of the park by following the links below or checking locally at visitor centers.      Seasonal Ranger Programs by Area  Skagit District (Highway 20 and Skagit River) 2016 Summer Season Program Schedule (695 KB pdf) Hozomeen (north end of Ross Lake) Check back for the 2016 season program schedule! Stehekin District (Lake Chelan and Stehekin Valley) Check back for the 2016 season program schedule!          NPS Centennial 2016 Visit the NPS Centennial page for events and programs scheduled during the 2016 celebration.
